substitution.copyText: I lov’d you ever, but it is not matter,
substitution.amendedText: I lov’d you ever, but it is not matter --

substitution.copyText: Let Hercules himself do what he may
substitution.amendedText: Let Hercules himself do what he may ,

substitution.copyText: Good Gertrard set some watch over you son,
substitution.amendedText: Good Gertrurd set some watch over you son,

substitution.copyText: '' An hour of quiet thereby shall we see, |'' Till then in patience out proceeding be.
